70010000078488.description:
Get ready for a high-octane adventure in RPM - Road Punk Mayhem, a top-down vertical shoot’em up that combines intense bullet hell mayhem with cel-shaded style! Inspired by arcade genre classics, RPM - Road Punk Mayhem lets you choose from 3 pilots of questionable sanity as you cruise through post-apocalyptic stages laying waste to enemy vehicles.

From tanks and helicopters to armored jets and monster trucks, your opponents won’t pull any stops as they try to destroy your little fighter craft. Pick up fuel and warp-enabling stopwatches to keep moving, combo your way to huge score multipliers and use bombs to clear roadblocks! How long can you survive the wastelands? Challenge online leaderboards and push your damage-dealing skills to the limit!

Features:

• Experience intense bullet hell mayhem across post-apocalyptic stages!
• Choose from 3 pilots, each with a unique ship and signature armaments.
• Pick up fuel tanks to keep moving and stopwatches to enable warp!
• Execute combos to increase your score multiplier!
• Challenge online leaderboards!
70010000078488.intro: Hit the road for explosive bullet hell action through a post-apocalyptic wasteland!
70010000078488.name: RPM - Road Punk Mayhem

70010000078903.description:
When Splinter is kidnapped by Shredder, mysterious portals simultaneously appear across NYC. With April and Metalhead analysing recovered artifacts for clues, the Turtles battle to recover their father from the clutches of the Foot Clan. However, as the gang gets ever closer to Splinter’s otherworldly location, an even greater threat lingers in the shadows…

In Splintered Fate, brace yourself for fast-paced, roguelike action where no two runs are the same. With randomised power-ups, room layouts, and boss modifiers, the excitement never ends. Take control of all four Turtles, each wielding unique powers, and team up with friends for bodacious co-op gameplay. Explore iconic NYC locations, upgrade your Turtle powers, and prepare to face off against formidable enemies.

With thrilling combat and endless challenges, Splintered Fate promises to keep you engaged in the FIGHT, ADAPT, REPEAT portal loop. Be ready to restore peace to the city!
70010000078903.intro: Unleash the Turtles in a roguelike quest to rescue Splinter from the Foot Clan!
70010000078903.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate

70010000084012.description:
The ordinary gaming night among four friends takes a chaotic turn when they find themselves transported to a preposterous fantasy realm teeming with thousands of wacky monsters!

Equip yourself with pizza frag-grenades, enchanted fidget spinners, unleash preposterous magic spells, or even fling your very own friends into the fray to repel the relentless hordes of monsters determined to obliterate you.

And if that's still not enough, scavenge resources and blueprints, then harness the 'Forge of Destiny' to customize your weapons or craft the ultimate armaments of your nerdy wet dreams! Can you endure for 20 minutes of non-stop madness and make your way back to your gaming night?

Nerd Survivors is a bullet-heaven action rogue-lite survivor adventure, set in the Doom & Destiny Worlds universe.
70010000084012.intro: Use pizzas, fidget spinners or katamari of monsters to fight countless enemies! Master the "Forge" and customize the ultimate weapon in this comedy action rogue-lite survivor.
70010000084012.name: Nerd Survivors

70010000062303.description:
Get ready for a real space adventure! 

In Over Horizon, you and your trusty spaceship will traverse a number of bizarre worlds. With three different weapons which you can upgrade and combine any way you want, you will face the massive bosses and various enemies that will come your way.

Also, relive gaming history and fire up your engines on some of the most important classic shmups – fully playable on modern platforms. Set in a Steam Punk-centered world, Steel Empire lets you choose between the Striker Airplane or the Zeppelin equipped with an areal mine launcher to fight back against the Motorhead Empire's invasion.

Over Horizon X Steel Empire contains:

• Over Horizon (1991)
• Steel Empire (1992)
• Steel Empire (2004)
70010000062303.intro: Nostalgic thrills await in this trio of shoot ’em-up masterpieces!
70010000062303.name: Over Horizon X Steel Empire

70010000067770.description:
Jello is a physics-based platformer redefining movement mechanics. 
Funny to learn, hard to master, these controls are not for the casual player!
Playing as a squishy Jelly, complete the challenging levels and help the lemur collect all the world crystals so he can be at peace.
70010000067770.intro:
Jump, slap, slide, swim and roll! 
Squish and stretch Jello in a tactile unusual way
Complete the challenging levels and help restore the world
70010000067770.name: Jello

70010000077332.description:
Navigate through dangerous galaxies, face unexpected hazards like wormholes, asteroid showers, and space squids, and keep the engines fueled up. Fix hull breaches and extinguish fires to prevent explosive disasters. No day is ever dull when you're a spaceship recovery engineer!

Why You'll Love Fueled Up:
● Chaotic in the best way! Get ready for running around trying to save the spaceship from aliens, asteroids, and your crewmates' bad decisions. And wait— is that a giant octopus?
● Online and Local Multiplayer: Play with crewmates locally or online. 
● Intense couch co-op fun: Repair the spaceship in a dangerous, rapidly changing environment! Every level is packed with unique hazards and mechanics.
● Star-based scoring system and bonus objectives for endless fun and replayability.
● Cute character designs - no matter if you want to play as a cat, or a banana!

Grab your crew, start your engines, and become the best spaceship recovery engineer the universe has ever seen!
70010000077332.intro: A chaotic couch co-op game for up to four players. Fuel, fix and rescue damaged spaceships before the evil space octopus gets its tentacles on them!
70010000077332.name: Fueled Up

70010000078446.description:
Defy gravity and traverse tricky 3D platforms and mind-bending challenges as you navigate your robot to the end of each level, collecting keys, coins, cosmic cubes and more as you go! Can you find and beat the elusive bonus levels?

Each level has been meticulously crafted and rewards creative use of the innovative gameplay mechanics, such as changing gravity. With regular checkpoints and a 'No Stress' mode The Gravity Trickster is easy to learn and challenging to master. How fast can you clear each stage?

Unlock new cosmetics to customise your robot, including hidden skins and animations for finishing everything!
70010000078446.intro: Turn platforming on its head with The Gravity Trickster!
70010000078446.name: The Gravity Trickster

70010000079300.description:
SCHiM is a game about jumping from shadow to shadow, while interacting with a relaxing and lively environment. 

What is a schim?
A schim is the soul and spirit of an object, thing, or living being. Everything in the world has one. A schim should never be separated from their thing! This does happen to your schim, this schim who is attached to a human being is separated from them early on in the game.

Can you get back to him before it's too late?

Features
- Unique 3D platforming through shadows.
- Animated shadow platforms and environments.
- Each level has its own scenery with small stories.
- A story of a person losing their shadow.
- A beautiful abstract world.
70010000079300.intro: SCHiM is a game about jumping from shadow to shadow.
70010000079300.name: SCHiM

70010000079344.description:
Magnus Trilogy is a series of three visually captivating and emotionally immersive visual novel games, each with its own unique narrative and hand-drawn graphics. The Trilogy invites players to explore the depths of the human psyche, confronting them with unsettling themes and thought-provoking storytelling.

Magnus Trilogy includes 3 games:
Magnus Positive Photoaxis
Magnus Imago
Lazarus A.D. 2222
70010000079344.intro: Explore the depths of the human psyche.
70010000079344.name: Magnus Trilogy

70010000080079.description:
"Throw it! Dinosaur Panic" is a dinosaur dropping game that anyone can enjoy!

Press the button to throw the dinosaurs!
Hold down the button to throw as much as you can!!

The dinosaurs that fall into the tray will come to play in Dinosaur Land.
Collect all the dinosaurs!

If you hit the same dinosaur, the dinosaur will get bigger and bigger.
If you drop a big dinosaur, you have a chance to get a high score!

The fun roulette that appears while throwing is
If you drop a rainbow egg, a new dinosaur will appear!
If you get a gold dinosaur, a silver dinosaur, or a fever, you're super lucky!

But be careful of the Blacksaurus!
If you drop it into the tray, it will cause damage.

Let's throw various dinosaurs!

"Throw it! Dinosaur Panic" can be enjoyed in four modes.

"One Player with no time limit"
No time limit!
Take your time and get lots of dinosaurs!

"One Player with time limit"
How many points can you get in a short amount of time?
Let's do our best with luck on our side!

"Two Player with time limit"
Share the controller and work together to get a high score!

"Dinosaur Land"
After playing, take a look at Dinosaur Land.
The dinosaurs you've caught are coming to play.
Touch the screen or press the buttons and enjoy the dinosaurs' reactions!
In the Dinosaur list, you can see the dinosaurs as they grow one by one.
Get all 32 dinosaurs and complete the Dinosaur list!
70010000080079.intro:
Throw it here! Throw it here!
A dinosaur drop game!
70010000080079.name: Throw it! Dinosaur Panic

70010000080664.description:
Test your speedrunning skill in over 150 challenges! Each challenge relives a memorable moment from one of 13 NES™ games*, including classics like Super Mario Bros.™ 3, The Legend of Zelda™, Donkey Kong™, and Metroid™. Start small by seeing how quickly you can blaze through the first level of Super Mario Bros. or how fast you can gobble up an enemy in Kirby’s Adventure™*. Hone your skills in practice and see if you have what it takes to be a champion—the tougher challenges may truly test your limits!

Nintendo World Championships: NES™ Edition is coming to the Nintendo Switch™ system on July 18.

Compete against players around the world online**

Jump into the World Championship Mode with a Nintendo Switch Online membership** and aim for a spot on the leaderboards in five challenges that rotate each week. At the end of each week, compare your times against players of varying skill levels, or sit back and watch the world’s best time to learn how to improve. With "byte-sized" challenges, you don't need to master entire games to feel like a Nintendo World Champion!

Challenge your friends*** on the couch

Gather up to 8 players in the local Party Mode to take on challenges individually or in themed Challenge packs. With an automatic rewind feature to undo mistakes, even completely new players can compete.

You will be able to play with Nintendo Entertainment System Controllers**** as well (sold separately).
70010000080664.intro: Bring the Nintendo World Championships to your living room
70010000080664.name: Nintendo World Championships: NES™ Edition

70010000080966.intro: Deliver various cargoes across the industrial zone and complete all tasks in a realistic fork lift simulator!
70010000080966.name: Cargo Manager: Forklift Simulator

70010000081026.intro: Exciting horror about liminal spaces - try to escape from the dark labyrinth!
70010000081026.name: Backroom Escape: Labyrinth Horror

70010000081881.description:
Discover Sandoria, a realm born from the bravery of heroes Sage Roberts and Sir Sayles, who defeated the Demon King centuries ago. As Dean, the young Lord of Sayles, your adventure begins with a quest to defend your people from ruthless bandits. Join forces with the steadfast knight Flei and the determined messenger Krucia to confront a looming threat that endangers the entire kingdom.

Master the innovative Multi-Attack and Accel systems to execute powerful combos and strategic moves. Equip Skill Gems and Skill Plates to customize your characters' abilities, and manage shared resources like Skill Points and Limit Points for devastating Secret Techniques. Explore an expanding world map, interact with diverse characters, and uncover hidden secrets that shape the fate of Sandoria.

Will you protect your homeland and emerge as the hero of this epic saga?
70010000081881.intro: Emerge as the hero of Sandoria in an epic fantasy RPG!
70010000081881.name: Ancient Phantasma

70010000081976.description:
Rivalia is an ARPG / Roguelite singleplayer video game, with a cartoon art style that aims to combine the best of both genres. 

Taking control of 4 different characters you may confront a series of challenging opponents that threaten the life as you know it.

The game takes place in the castle of Rivalia, whose reality has been distorted due to a powerful spell. Our heroes' mission will be to regain control of the castle by ending its curse and bringing peace to the kingdom.

The game has been created with a total of 6 levels divided into three different biomes, each with its own aesthetics and challenges. All levels are made up of a single boss and a procedurally generated dungeon, full of real-time battles, being able to switch instantly between the four protagonists and in this way get the most out of their different abilities.
70010000081976.intro: Face epic battles taking control of 4 characters simultaneously.
70010000081976.name: Rivalia: Dungeon Raiders

70010000082107.description:
It is an adventure game released in Japan by Micro Cabin in 1987. Players take on the role of a field mouse named Prill and embark on an adventure to rescue the animals of a village turned to stone by the Demon King Pazul, as well as his kidnapped sister.

The game follows a command selection system. Players choose commands such as "talk," "call," "listen," "examine," and "eat" depending on the scene, advancing the scenario accordingly. It can be considered a classic adventure game. While some old adventure games were known for their difficulty or getting stuck, this game lacks such frustrating elements, making it enjoyable even for beginners. While there are challenging parts in the story, players can resort to trial-and-error with commands if they get stuck.

One of the highlights is undoubtedly its unique world view, similar to other titles like "Harry Fox" from the same company. The various animals that appear behave almost like humans, and interacting with them or exploring the world gives players a sense of stepping into a picture book.

*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000082107.intro: A cute adventure game where the main character, a mouse named Prill, embarks on a journey to rescue his kidnapped sister.
70010000082107.name: EGGCONSOLE SEILANE PC-8801mkIISR

70010000082615.description:
Satryn DX is a little twin stick shooty featuring infinite levels of chaotic, physics-based baddie blasting. save your friends to increase the score multiplier. the bigger the score, the more power-ups will spawn. i hope your brain enjoys this reward loop.

- 12 fearsome baddies (not cuddly) 
- 9 power-ups that will make you smile and say "i'm having fun"
- 5 hazards that add to the chaotic nature of this strange place
- Global leaderboards
- A manual that reveals helpful hints and useless lore as you discover things
- The love of your friends makes you stronger
70010000082615.intro: A chaotic, infinite twin stick shooter
70010000082615.name: Satryn DX

70010000082630.description:
Race with your friends in split screen or have a blast racing on your own!

FUN DRIVING
Traffic Race 3D 2 is a mixture of arcade racing and casual driving on open tracks. No more re-spawns when you hit the racetrack border. Go crazy and find the fastest route on each track.

ONLINE GLOBAL HIGH SCORE
Are you the best driver in the world? Now you can prove it! Show the world that you are the next Schumacher or Hamilton. Can you make it to 1st place in the global rank?

ARCADE RACING PHYSICS
We’ve taken inspiration from all extreme motor sports and then we’ve stripped it down to a fun arcade driving experience. This lets you drift around corners at 240 km/h with your car while still having fun and do crash as often as you wish.

RACE SPLITSCREEN STYLE
Race against your friends and family in a race filled with adrenaline.

UNLOCKABLE CARS
You can play 6 cars with different characteristics. Some cars are better at drifting while others have faster acceleration and top speed.

SUITABLE FOR ALL AGES
Everyone can enjoy Traffic Race 3D 2
70010000082630.name: Traffic Race 3D 2

70010000082930.description:
This is a picture search brain training game where you look for the hidden items in cute illustrations!

How to Play:
1.Memorize the items from the task list.
2.Search for the hidden items in the illustration.
3.Once you find where the items are, touch the spot!

It’s easy and fun, perfect for killing time during your free moments!

If you really can’t find it, you can check a hint to see where it might be!

・Is there a UFO in that part of outer space?
・Where is the green bird in the sky?
・Where is the four-leaf clover?

…And many more! You are the one to find the hidden secret items in the cute illustrations!
70010000082930.intro: Find the Hidden Secret Items in Cute Illustrations!
70010000082930.name: Tiny Treasure Hunt DX

70010000083058.description:
A game that exercises memory and observation skills.

It is easy to play!
・Memorize every detail of the picture within a time limit of 1 minute.
・Answer the question ""? Answer the questions from among 4 choices about what was hidden by ""?

Play alone or with family and friends.
Enjoy the game with family and friends.
It is also recommended for live-playing by distributors.

If you can answer all the questions correctly
the title of ""King of Memory"" will be awarded!
70010000083058.intro:
Memorize a photo in 1 minute and answer the quiz!
Your memory will be tested with a very difficult quiz.
70010000083058.name: Photographic Memory Test

70010000083109.description:
This is a spot-the-difference game where you can easily train your brain while being soothed by beautiful and cute photos of aquatic creatures.

Whales, octopuses, and even crayfish are here! There are plenty of different fish and creatures in the seas and rivers!

How to Play:
・Look closely at the photo on the ""top"" half of the split screen.
・Identify differences between this photo and the reversed image on the ""bottom"" half.
・Touch the spot where you find a mistake!

Even seemingly obvious answers can be surprisingly difficult when flipped!
It's a quick game perfect for killing time.

Press the hint button only when you really can't figure it out!
(It will give you a pretty big hint.)

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000083109.intro:
Find the Differences in the Photos of Sea Creatures!
Not just cute fish, but also dolphins, seals, and jellyfish!
70010000083109.name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference with fish photos

70010000083319.description:
It’s going to be a really exhilarating fight that no one will want to miss! The dangerous post-apocalyptic world is crawling with zombies and only the bravest and most experienced drivers and the toughest survivors will still be left standing, fighting the countless armies of the undead and dealing with them on their own or taking part in breathtaking competitions!

Key features

• Millions of blood-thirsty zombies of different kinds.
• Mass destruction of the undead.
• 9 cars to upgrade including the Zombie Combine Harvester.
• Bloody massacre in real 3D.

Discover the dangerous post-apocalyptic world with cool upgradable cars!
70010000083319.intro: Brutal upgradable cars, big guns and daredevil speed will steer you through places that are chock-a-block with zombies...
70010000083319.name: Zombie Derby 2

70010000083526.description:
Begin your journey in the serene yet tumultuous era of feudal Japan, where honor and strategy define the path to greatness. In Shogun Samurai Tycoon, you are entrusted with the monumental task of building a powerful samurai empire from the ground up.

Architect of Tradition and Power:
As the daimyo and master strategist, your decisions shape the destiny of your people. Lay the foundation with resource management strategies that harness the wealth of natural and cultural resources—harvest rice from fertile fields, develop skilled artisans, and manage water supplies to sustain your growing populace.

Master the Art of Samurai Engineering:
Unlock advanced feudal technologies as your empire expands. Design intricate irrigation systems to ensure bountiful harvests and construct architectural wonders that stand as a testament to your empire’s might. Each building not only enhances your city’s efficiency but also its historical grandeur.

Forge Alliances, Defend Your Lands:
No empire grows in isolation. Forge strategic alliances with neighboring clans and manage trade routes that bring exotic goods to your city’s gates. Train elite samurai warriors to defend against the ever-looming threat of rival factions and bandits, and fortify your empire with walls and castles that can withstand any assault.

Conquer and Prosper:
Embark on campaigns to expand your territory. Each conquest brings new challenges and opportunities. Establish satellite villages, integrate outlying provinces into your empire, and tap into their unique resources.

Divine Favor or Your Own Cunning?:
While the Shinto deities watch over your progress, your choices determine your favor in their eyes. Conduct sacred ceremonies and build shrines to win their blessings—or face their wrath. Navigate a world where divine interventions can alter the course of your empire’s fate.

A Living Empire:
Each citizen in your empire has a role—from farmers and traders to samurai and artisans. Their lives intertwine with your decisions, creating a dynamic tapestry of human stories driven by your rule.

Shogun Samurai Tycoon isn’t just about building an empire; it’s about weaving the fabric of a legendary dominion that will stand the test of time. Are you ready to leave your mark on history?
70010000083526.intro: Are you ready to leave your mark on history?
70010000083526.name: Shogun Samurai Tycoon

70010000083724.description: "Suddenly an Ogre" brings back the magic of classic gamebooks with a captivating virtual twist. Step into a nostalgic journey where your decisions shape the story. Will you save your sister and become a hero? The choice is yours!
70010000083724.intro:
Relive the magic of classic gamebooks.
Step into the adventure: Your story, your ending.
What path will you choose?
70010000083724.name: Suddenly an Ogre

70010000084035.description:
This is a fun puzzle game where you can learn how to write the names of various countries in KANJI.

How to Play:
1.Look closely at the given country name and flag.
2.Choose the correct KANJI from four options to fill in the blanks.
3.Drag and drop the correct KANJI with the finger icon into the blank spaces.

From well-known countries to those rarely written in KANJI, this game includes a variety of country names that will surprise you with their KANJI representations. Discovering these KANJI will make you appreciate Japanese culture even more!

If you find it difficult, the hint function will gently support you.
Whether you love KANJI and Japanese or are just starting to learn, this game is perfect for you!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000084035.intro:
How to Write “Argentina” in KANJI?
Learn Country Names in KANJI with a Fun Puzzle Game!
70010000084035.name: Slot & Learn Country Names in KANJI

70010000084064.description:
Dive into stunning anime art and solve puzzles to enjoy images of lovely girls posing exclusively for you! As the difficulty level increases, the images become more piquant. Take your time, enjoy the process and collect all the puzzles.

Features:
• 50 puzzles with images of lovely girls in seductive outfits
• Simple and addictive game mechanics
• Increasing puzzle difficulty
• Relaxing and atmospheric music
70010000084064.intro: Discover the charming and naughty girls in Hentai Paradise.
70010000084064.name: Hentai Paradise Vol. 1

70010000084542.description:
Embrace the Beauty of Everyday Life While Learning Complex KANJI!

Welcome to a unique game where you can enjoy beautiful illustrations of daily life while mastering challenging KANJI characters.

How to Play:
・View the KANJI character given as a challenge.
・Find the corresponding object in the illustration.
・Tap the correct spot once you’ve identified it.

When you get it right, you’ll discover interesting trivia and fun facts about why the KANJI is written that way.

Explore Various Situations:
・Which item in the family restaurant is written as “麵麭”?
・Which New Year’s game is called “骨牌”?
・Which plant in the flower shop is labeled “仙人掌”?

…and many more!

Don’t worry if you get stuck! Our hint feature will gently guide you, making this game enjoyable for KANJI masters and beginners alike. No matter your level, you’ll find fun and learning combined.

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000084542.intro:
Where is the flower labeled “仙人掌” in the illustration?
Let’s learn KANJI, even difficult ones for Japanese people, in a fun way through this game!
70010000084542.name: Which KANJI? So FANCY!

70010000076242.description:
Welcome to feudal Japan, a world of samurai and danger.

Play as a heroic frog samurai tasked with taking down the deadly snake clan and bringing an end to the war. Your agility and speed will be tested as you go over obstacles, walls and ceilings, and navigate through portals.

But be careful, the snakes won't give up without a fight. You'll need to use all your frog skills to defeat them and save your kingdom.

Join the epic battle between frogs and snakes and prove yourself as the ultimate Frogurai!

Features:
* 50 levels and speed run mode
* Puzzle game, move in a single direction until you hit an obstacle
* Cute art and sound
* Fast-paced Samurai action
70010000076242.intro: Prove yourself as the ultimate frog samurai
70010000076242.name: Frogurai

70010000077170.description: Toree is back with a rich collection of games. Toree's Panic Pack combines the exciting mini-adventure Toree Genesis, spanning three fast-paced levels in a fresh environment, with Toree Jumbled Jam 2, which is a set of four new and challenging bonus levels using the level styles from Toree 2. Lastly, Toree Missions offers 24 tight challenge missions in a futuristic environment challenging your platforming skills in unique new ways. Get ready for Toree's greatest challenges yet!
70010000077170.name: Toree's Panic Pack

70010000080557.description:
Experience a powerful tale of love and loss from the perspective of a cat, who bears witness to the most intimate moments of a couple's life. A Lost Note takes players on a journey through a variety of immersive environments, each with its unique visual style and atmosphere. Players will explore a winter environment with cherry blossoms blooming in the snow, a fall environment during golden hour, a mystical forest with strange and fantastical creatures, and a dark forest with tall and twisted trees. These environments provide a diverse range of moods, from peaceful and serene to mysterious and foreboding, creating a rich and engaging world for players to explore.
A Lost Note's soundtrack is designed to enhance the player's emotional experience and immerse them in the game's world fully. The music shifts seamlessly to match the mood and atmosphere of the different environments, from peaceful and serene to mysterious and eerie. The piano is a prominent instrument in the game's soundtrack, providing a melancholic and reflective tone to the game's emotional journey.
Features:
	•	Exploring diverse locations: Players will navigate through a variety of environments, in search of clues and secrets. Each location is uniquely designed with beautiful visuals and atmospheric soundscapes.
	•	Collecting Pages: Throughout the game, players will collect pages that reveal more about the lost love story. These pages are scattered throughout the game's world and must be found to progress the story.
	•	Uncovering Mysterious Landmarks: The game's landmarks have a deeper meaning and significance to the lost love story.
	•	Emotive Storyline: A Lost Note is a heartwarming tale of love, loss, and rediscovery. The story is told from the perspectives of both the cat and the lost love, providing a deeper and more meaningful narrative experience.
70010000080557.intro: Journey through diverse landscapes and collect the pieces of a lost love story in A Lost Note.
70010000080557.name: A Lost Note

70010000082812.description:
It's time to change your watch for something unique and sensual.

Enjoy your day with the 5 most tempting girls, and check what they are doing as time passes.

This extraordinary timepiece allows you to fully express yourself by customizing the clock's display and background to reflect your unique personality and preferences.

Features:
- Time and date display
- More than 70 charming photos of 5 girls: Ivona, Slava, Anari, Kate, and Liz
- Plenty of customization options
- You won't take your eyes off it 

Transform your clock into a portal to the anime realm you love.
70010000082812.intro: Spend your time with beautiful anime girls posing just for you.
70010000082812.name: Ecchi Time

70010000082972.description:
Music Box is a drum machine app in the form of a handheld, easy-to-use mixing board, allowing you to create a variety of percussion beats. Compose everything that is playing in your soul and feel like a real DJ!


FEEL THE BEAT
At your disposal there will be a panel with a 16-step sequencer, where you will program your drum beat step by step. Whether you have heavier rock sounds or melancholic jazz in your heart, Music Box will have something to suit you.


ALL THE DRUMS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Snare drums, toms, cymbals – mix and match percussion elements to create the perfect beat. Switch between different genres, experiment and test your musical ear. There are countless settings at your disposal!


KEY FEATURES:
- 3 different genre sets: Rock, Jazz, Acoustic,
- Every set includes 8 different sounds - a whole drum kit!
- Play your beats in real time or…
- …arrange them with 16-step sequencer
- Mix sounds together and control the tempo
70010000082972.intro: Start your musical fun and create a catchy beat with the Music Box!
70010000082972.name: Music Box

70010000083520.description:
Relax as you follow the numbers and paint at your own pace!

Dive into unique canvases full of unicorns, hearts, cakes, and other stunning images. Enjoy the satisfying 'click' as each diamond snaps into place, bringing vibrant colors to life!

Bring a dinosaur back from the past or draw a diamond castle in 3D - whatever you imagine, you can paint it... with diamonds!

Features: 
- Color by numbers almost 400 pictures!
- Create beautiful 3D paintings
- Choose from different canvas sizes
- Make awesome diamond art
- Listen to relaxing ASMR

Watch your masterpiece sparkle with each diamond you place!
70010000083520.intro: Let your imagination shine as you create stunning art with diamonds!
70010000083520.name: Diamond Painting ASMR

70010000083522.description:
AirStrike Command: Tactical Assault Operation
Take command of the skies in AirStrike Command: Tactical Assault Operation, where you control an advanced aircraft tasked with providing critical air support and tactical assistance to ground forces. Master the art of coordinating airstrikes, conducting reconnaissance, and neutralizing enemy threats from above. Experience the thrill of aerial combat in three unique game modes:

Escort and Defense Mode:
Objective: Escort a valuable payload, such as a convoy of ground vehicles or a aircraft, through hostile territory. Defend it from enemy forces and ensure its safe arrival at the destination while minimizing damage and casualties.

Scoring and Destruction Mode:
Objective: Cause maximum destruction and eliminate as many enemy targets as possible within a limited time frame. Score points by destroying enemy vehicles, structures, and installations.

Defense and Extraction Mode:
Objective: Defend a central objective, such as a command center, supply depot, or allied stronghold, from waves of enemy attacks.

Experience the ultimate aerial warfare with AirStrike Command: Tactical Assault Operation and dominate the battlefield from above!
70010000083522.intro: Command the skies. Defend with precision. Conquer with strategy.
70010000083522.name: AirStrike Command: Tactical Assault Operation

70010000083531.description:
Are you ready to dominate the court and lead your team to victory? Dive into "Basketball Slum Dunk 2024," the ultimate 3D basketball simulator that puts you in the shoes of a team leader with dreams of greatness.

Start with a modest squad and work your way up through the ranks, facing off against increasingly tough opponents. Each match is a test of your strategic thinking, quick reflexes, and leadership skills. Guide your players with precision, execute flawless plays, and watch as your team grows from rookies to champions.

Experience the excitement of high-stakes basketball with breathtaking 3D graphics and lifelike animations that bring every slam dunk, three-pointer, and buzzer-beater to life. Customize your team's appearance with a variety of skins and gear, making your squad unique on the court. Win matches to earn rewards, upgrade your roster, and unlock special abilities that give you an edge over the competition.

From local tournaments to global championships, "Basketball Slum Dunk 2024" offers a journey filled with challenges and triumphs. Can you build a legacy and lead your team to legendary status? The court is yours to conquer.
70010000083531.intro: Can you build a legacy and lead your team to legendary status?
70010000083531.name: Basketball Slum Dunk 2024

70010000083913.description:
Create tons of incredible fashion design looks for your clients and find them the perfect outfits for their big events! 

Welcome to Hollywood, the fabulous land of VIPs! Here, fashion rules, and all the amazing celebrities and fabulous models need to look their best to maintain their star status. That's where you come in - you're the stylist to the stars! Everyone's talking about the incredible looks you created at the latest red carpet event!

Your awesome reputation in fashion design is already bringing you fame and fortune! Lots of girls are heading to your stylist salon for fabulous fashion makeovers. Choose the perfect dress or outfit, add gorgeous accessories and fabulous shoes to complete the look! And don't forget to pick out a new hairstyle for your clients and make sure their nails are absolutely perfect!

Features:
- Open up your very own stylist salon and become famous!
- Style and dress up your clients in glamorous outfits!
- Help your clients get the prettiest makeovers the world has ever seen!
- Make sure their nails are perfect and complement them with rings and bracelets!
- Get your celebrity models amazing new hairstyles!

Whether you're already a makeover fan or new to the genre, this game is bound to leave you amazed!
70010000083913.intro: Dress up famous models and VIP celebrities to bring out their best looks with fabulous makeovers!
70010000083913.name: Stylist Girl

70010000084014.description: Before Spy Guy became a famous detective, he was dedicated to helping others from a young age. Alfred Moritz is trying to capture all the animals in the world to lock them in his private zoo. Can you and Spy Guy catch him before he achieves his goal? Discover the new Hidden Objects game, where in addition to searching for hidden objects, you will learn many fascinating facts about animals from around the world. With a beautiful, colorful, animated map, over 100 animals, an encyclopedia with interesting facts, and 3 game modes - see how quickly you can find them all!
70010000084014.intro: Find hidden objects and learn interesting facts about animals from around the world!
70010000084014.name: Spy Guy Animals Junior

70050000050441.description:
Take your time to discover how captivating this golden-haired beauty really is.

Features:
- 15 beautiful photos of Mia

Could this be the one you choose to spend your time with?
70050000050441.intro: This mature blonde is eager to deepen her connection with you.
70050000050441.name: Ecchi Time: Mia

70050000050443.description:
Don't waste any more time, spend your day with this alluring lady!

Features:
- 18 charming photos of Nadia

Could this be the one you choose to spend your time with?
70050000050443.intro: A fiery, passionate lady ready for a serious commitment.
70050000050443.name: Ecchi Time: Nadia

70050000050446.description:
Devote your time and attention to her, and she will become the one for you!

Features:
- 16 lovely photos of Roxi

Could this be the one you choose to spend your time with?
70050000050446.intro: An enchanting soul with lustrous black hair and a heart of gold.
70050000050446.name: Ecchi Time: Roxi

70050000050447.description:
After a long search for the perfect partner, you have the potential to be the perfect match for her.

Features:
- 17 tempting photos of Samanta

Could this be the one you choose to spend your time with?
70050000050447.intro: Can you bring warmth to the heart of this solitary woman?
70050000050447.name: Ecchi Time: Samanta

70050000050449.description:
When time appears to stand still, she powers ahead. Can you match her pace?

Features: 
- 12 alluring photos of Valeria 

Could this be the one you choose to spend your time with?
70050000050449.intro: A vibrant young woman, ready to share her positivity!
70050000050449.name: Ecchi Time: Valeria

70050000050453.description:
There’s no time to waste! Immerse yourself in the experience of her exotic beauty and let her enchant you.

Features:
- 11 gorgeous photos of Xena

Could this be the one you choose to spend your time with?
70050000050453.intro: Like a tropical fruit, she's ripe for the taking.
70050000050453.name: Ecchi Time: Xena

70050000050454.description:
It's time to get serious. Do you think you can handle everything Yoko has to offer?

Features:
- 11 attractive photos of Yoko

Could this be the one you choose to spend your time with?
70050000050454.intro: Ready to dive into a meaningful and fulfilling relationship?
70050000050454.name: Ecchi Time: Yoko

70050000050663.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 114 cute themed pictures
- 22 mandala themed pictures
- 62 fashion themed pictures
- 88 funny themed pictures

Complete fun and unique pictures from 4 new categories!
70050000050663.intro: Relax and have fun with new cute pictures!
70050000050663.name: Diamond Painting ASMR: Fun & Cute

70050000050665.description:

- 108 people themed pictures
